columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp when the log entry was generated.

columns.name: InsertId
columns.description: A unique identifier for the log entry used to prevent duplication.

columns.name: Resource
columns.description: A dynamic object containing metadata about the GCP resource associated with the log entry, including type and identifying labels.

columns.name: ProtoPayload
columns.description: A dynamic object holding the structured audit log payload, detailing the API call, requester identity, and request/response data.

columns.name: Severity
columns.description: The severity level of the log entry (e.g., INFO, WARNING, ERROR).

columns.name: LogName
columns.description: The full name of the log entry indicating its origin and log type within the GCP project.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: The time the event described by the log entry occurred.
